Journey Through Hardcore: Years 1995 to 2000
Mixed by Samination
Mix Cover			
Date Added:	2013-09-13
Codec:	MP3
Size:	194 MiB
Bitrate:	320 kb/s
Length:	1:24:51 (5091 seconds)
Speed:	185 BPM
Comment
I've been thinking for a long time to make a mix that goes through the years of Hardcore (and maybe even Makina and Gabber?), and now I finally got around to doing it. Here's the first part, showcasing Happy Hardcore from 1995 to 2000 (the years I liked).
